data.name: Warframe: Sound Quake Pack
data.detailed_description:
What is Prime Access

Prime Access is a rotating program that includes the latest Prime Warframes and Prime Gear in bundles of discounted Platinum and other exclusive items. Prime Access offers instant access to the latest Prime Warframes and Prime Gear without requiring the build time.

For more Prime Access information click here


About the Game

Get Banshee Prime Access now and make the newest Prime yours - instantly - including Banshee Prime, Euphona Prime, Helios Prime, and exclusive Customizations only available through Prime Access!

For more Prime Access Bundle options click here

SOUND QUAKE BUNDLE
· 3990 Platinum
· Banshee Prime Warframe & Prime Glyphs
· Helios Prime Sentinel & Euphona Prime
· Prime Accessories Pack

PRIME ACCESSORIES PACK
· Capella Prime Syandana
· Ictus Prime Sentinel Accessories
· 90 Day Credit & Affinity Booster

Banshee Prime, Euphona Prime, and Helios Prime can also be crafted from parts found in Relics in-game.

data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 8600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 3600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
